name: waste-permits-api
description: GOV.UK REST API service built using the Node.js HAPI framework for the Waste Permits service
author: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

scripts.unit-test: lab --pattern test --coverage --reporter console --output stdout --reporter html --output coverage.html --reporter lcov --output lcov.info --verbose -I 'core,__core-js_shared__'
scripts.api-test: lab --pattern api --reporter console --output stdout --reporter json --output api-test.json --verbose -I 'core,__core-js_shared__'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
